comments.raw_text:
Similar to bug 233109 but on a per-message basis rather than for a folder.
Do you intend this to be a temporary view (e.g., when viewing in plain-text by default to just look at the HTML representation "for now", which would be the main use case coming to my mind) or is it supposed to stick with the message when returning to it? The latter would imply that such attributes are stored with the message, so that would be more effort than just a temporary override until you switch to a different message at which time the default view is reinstated.

"Temporary HTML viewing" is needed for next:
- Always use View/Message Body As=PlainText for safety 
- If mail is not Junk and if user wants to view it in HTML, request ad-hoc "View as HTML".
IIRC, this feature was already requested in other bug(s), because I already knew such request by someone, but the bug was perhaps not for such enhancement only.

As you know, View/Message Body As is Global pref in Thunderbird, and the single Global pref is used in both "View/Message Body As menu setting" and "mail display".
So, unless enhancement will be made on menu handling, prefs setting, prefs use in menu/message display etc., action like next is needed for this bug.
> "View message as HTML temporary" button, context menu and so on for a selected message at Thread Pane.
> If View/Message Body As==PlainText, change it to "Original HTML",
> do load the selected message at Thread Pane into Message Pane.
> Upon load completion(Load event), change prefs back to View/Message Body As=PlainText.
Needless to say, global View/Message Body As is used by reload of the message and by load of other message.

Above is relatively easy action. Required code for above is not so large and is not so complex.
I tried it in my Add-On for my testing, and it works well as expected.

For clean implementation, enhancement/change like following in Thunderbird is needed.
- Per MessagePane View_MessageBodyAs option setting.
  Per MessagePane View_MessageBodyAs inherits global View/Message Body As value.
- Per MessagePane LoadInHTML_flag
- Message load always uses Per MessagePane View_MessageBodyAs instead of global prefs.
  - If Per MessagePane LoadInHTML_flag=true, set Per MessagePane View_MessageBodyAs=HTML,
    Else set Per MessagePane View_MessageBodyAs from global prefs.
  - Do load of selected message.
  - Upon load completion, clear Per MessagePane LoadInHTML_flag. 
- "Temporary HTML view" button or context menu
  - If number of selected messages at Thread Pane==1,
    Set Per MessagePane LoadInHTML_flag=true, and invoke Load of selected message.
  - Else do nothing(no meaning if multiple messages are selected)
